scripts.build: npm run pre-build && npx parcel build --no-source-maps src/index.js
scripts.build-watch: npm run pre-build && npx parcel watch src/index.js
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.pre-build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r src/icons/icon*.png src/giphy-attribution.png src/manifest.json dist
